text: Kristen Juras (n√©e Gustafson; born October 16, 1955) is an American businesswoman, attorney, law professor, and politician. She is the 37th Lieutenant Governor of Montana since 2021. She is a Republican. Juras was first elected in November 2020 and assumed office on January 4, 2021. ==References== Category:Lieutenant Governors of Montana Category:Living people Category:1955 births Category:Academics from Montana Category:Lawyers from Montana Category:Businesspeople from Montana Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Kristen Juras
